name: The Point of Power
description:
A short little game I made in Powerpoint for Ludum Dare 51 (theme: 'every 10 seconds')

Please do not scroll or use arrowkeys to change slides. Game is played by hovering over objects with your mouse!

The .ppsx file will open in presentation mode

I added the .pptx file since this is sort of my source code ;-)

Thank you for playing!
